title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average price in U.S. dollars, with a total of 7 data points.
Overall Average price in U.S. dollars has decreased over the Year.
Average price in U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2016 to 2015, slightly increasing from 2015 to 2014, roughly constant from 2014 to 2013, and lastly slightly decreasing from 2013 to 2010.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2015 and 2014.
Max Average price in U.S. dollars about 36.64 was recorded at Year 2014
Min Average price in U.S. dollars about 28.68 was recorded at Year 2010
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average price in U.S. dollars, with a total of 7 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely decreasing which exists from 2014 to 2012.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is slightly increasing which exists from 2016 to 2014.
Also, the next significant trend is extremely decreasing which exists from 2011 to 2010.
But, the next significant trend is slightly increasing which exists from 2012 to 2011.
